attributes.action: To Bring back Mr.T on our tv screens...............
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of the recent snickers advert on tv , I would like to formally ask the prime minister to push for MR.T ( A.K.A: B.A.Baracus ) to be brought back to our television screens.

I pity the fool who does not take heed to this petition and refrains from putting their name down.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
